Strike.NAME: Strike
Strike.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Potential Orb with !D! Potency.

Defend.NAME: Defend
Defend.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Magnetic Orb with !B! Potency.

Reverse.NAME: Reverse
Reverse.DESCRIPTION: Reverse the order of your Orbs. NL Evoke your next Orb.
Reverse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Reverse the order of your Orbs. NL Evoke your next Orb.

KickStart.NAME: Kick-start
KickStart.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Channel a Magnetic Orb with !B! Potency. NL Evoke your next orb. NL Exhaust.

Propulsion.NAME: Propulsion
Propulsion.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Thermal Orb with !D! Potency. NL Draw 1 card.

Blaze.NAME: Blaze
Blaze.DESCRIPTION: Channel !M! Thermal Orbs with !D! Potency. NL Exhaust 1 card from your hand.

Friction.NAME: Friction
Friction.DESCRIPTION: Every time you Evoke a Kinetic Orb, Channel a Thermal Orb with the same Potency. NL Ethereal.
Friction.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Every time you Evoke a Kinetic Orb, Channel a Thermal Orb with the same Potency.

Intensify.NAME: Intensify
Intensify.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Orb slots. NL Gain 1 Focus.

Threaten.NAME: Threaten
Threaten.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Potential Orb with !D! Potency. NL Apply 1 Vulnerable.

Knockback.NAME: Knockback
Knockback.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Kinetic Orb with !D! Potency. NL Discard 2 cards.

Deflect.NAME: Deflect
Deflect.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Magnetic Orb with !B! Potency (Has 1 more potency for each Magnetic Orb currently Channeled).

Polarize.NAME: Polarize
Polarize.DESCRIPTION: Merge ALL adjacent Magnetic Orbs. NL Channel a Magnetic Orb with !B! Potency.

MergeSort.NAME: Merge Sort
MergeSort.DESCRIPTION: Merge ALL Orbs of the same type and sort them by potency (descending). NL Draw 1 card.
MergeSort.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Merge ALL Orbs of the same type and sort them by potency (descending). NL Draw 1 card.

Radiation.NAME: Radiation
Radiation.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Nuclear Orb with !M! Potency. NL (37 Damage in total)
Radiation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel a Nuclear Orb with !M! Potency. NL (49 Damage in total)

PushOut.NAME: Push Out
PushOut.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Magnetic Orb with !B! Potency. NL Evoke your next Orb.

Cooldown.NAME: Cooldown
Cooldown.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Magnetic Orb with !B! Potency. NL Channel 1 Frost. NL Decrease potency of all currently Channeled Thermal Orbs by 2.

GrowingPotential.NAME: Growing Potential
GrowingPotential.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Orb slot. NL Push ALL Potential orbs to the back of Orb queue and trigger their passive effect.
GrowingPotential.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Orb slot. NL Push ALL Potential orbs to the back of Orb queue and trigger their passive effect twice.

Spring.NAME: Spring
Spring.DESCRIPTION: Merge ALL Kinetic Orbs into single Potential Orb and push it to the back of Orb queue.
Spring.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Merge ALL Kinetic AND Potential Orbs into single Potential Orb and push it to the back of Orb queue.

Superposition.NAME: Superposition
Superposition.DESCRIPTION: Evoke the next orb NL !M! times without removing it. NL Decrease it's Potency by 5.

Acceleration.NAME: Acceleration
Acceleration.DESCRIPTION: Trigger the passive ability of ALL your Orbs.

Demagnetize.NAME: Demagnetize
Demagnetize.DESCRIPTION: Magnetic Orbs no longer Evoke other Magnetic Orbs. NL Gain 2 Dexterity.

Newtons1.NAME: Newton's 1st Law
Newtons1.DESCRIPTION: Kinetic Orbs don't decay for !M! turns.

Newtons2.NAME: Newton's 2nd Law
Newtons2.DESCRIPTION: Put the next Orb to the back of Orb queue and trigger it's passive effect.
Newtons2.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put next 2 Orbs to the back of Orb queue and trigger their passive effects.

Newtons3.NAME: Newton's 3rd Law
Newtons3.DESCRIPTION: Evoke your rightmost Kinetic orb. NL Gain Block equal to it's Potency.
Newtons3.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Evoke your most Potent Kinetic orb. NL Gain Block equal to it's Potency.

Roast.NAME: Roast
Roast.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Thermal Orb with !D! Potency. NL Apply !M! Weak.

IceSandwich.NAME: Ice Sandwich
IceSandwich.DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 Frost. NL Channel a Magnetic Orb with !B! Potency. NL Channel 1 Frost.

KnockOut.NAME: Knock Out
KnockOut.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Kinetic Orb with !D! Potency. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply 1 Stunned. NL Exhaust.

Ground.NAME: Ground
Ground.DESCRIPTION: Channel Potential Orb and Kinetic Orb, both with !D! Potency. NL Apply 1 Weak and Vulnerable.
Ground.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel Kinetic Orb and Potential Orb, both with !D! Potency. NL Apply 1 Vulnerable and Weak.

DarkMatter.NAME: Dark Matter
DarkMatter.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Potential Orb with !D! Potency. NL Costs 1 less for every Potential Orb Channeled this combat.

NuclearReactor.NAME: Nuclear Reactor
NuclearReactor.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Nuclear Orb with !M! Potency. NL (5 Damage in total) NL Channel 1 Plasma.
NuclearReactor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel a Nuclear Orb with !M! Potency. NL (12 Damage in total) NL Channel 1 Plasma.

EnergyTransfer.NAME: Energy Transfer
EnergyTransfer.DESCRIPTION: The next !M! times you would lose HP, Channel a Kinetic Orb targeted at yourself with Potency of the HP you would've lost.

Relativity.NAME: Relativity
Relativity.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the Potency of ALL your Orbs by 2. NL ALL enemies lose !M! Strength for this turn.

ClosedSystem.NAME: Closed System
ClosedSystem.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Magnetic Orb with !B! Potency. NL Next turn, gain [E] .

Impact.NAME: Impact
Impact.DESCRIPTION: Channel 2 Kinetic Orbs with !D! Potency. NL Costs 1 less for every Kinetic Orb Channeled this turn.

AllignedFields.NAME: Alligned Fields
AllignedFields.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Magnetic Orb with !B! Potency. NL Trigger the passive effect of all your Magnetic Orbs.
AllignedFields.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Trigger the passive effect of your rightmost Orb. NL Channel a Magnetic Orb with !B! Potency. NL Trigger the passive effect of all your Magnetic Orbs.

SolarFlare.NAME: Solar Flare
SolarFlare.DESCRIPTION: Channel Kinetic and Thermal Orb, both with !D! Potency. NL Channel a Nuclear Orb with !M! Potency. NL (4 Damage in total)
SolarFlare.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel Kinetic and Thermal Orb, both with !D! Potency. NL Channel a Nuclear Orb with !M! Potency. NL (5 Damage in total)

Stabilize.NAME: Stabilize
Stabilize.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Upgrade all cards in your hand for the rest of combat. NL Heal 1 HP for every card Upgraded. NL Exhaust.
Stabilize.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Upgrade all cards in your hand for the rest of combat. NL Heal 1 HP for every card Upgraded. NL Exhaust.

PerpetuumMobile.NAME: Perpetuum Mobile
PerpetuumMobile.DESCRIPTION: At the start of every turn, Channel a Kinetic Orb with !M! Potency.

Entropy.NAME: Entropy
Entropy.DESCRIPTION: Average the potency of all your Orbs (Rounded up). NL Exhaust.
Entropy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Average the potency of all your Orbs (Rounded up).
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL (Sets the Potency of all Orbs to

Dynamo.NAME: Dynamo
Dynamo.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] for every 4 Orbs you Evoke.

DoubleSlit.NAME: Double Slit
DoubleSlit.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Potential Orb with !D! Potency and randomly chosen target twice.

Research.NAME: Research
Research.DESCRIPTION: Draw cards until you draw a Skill or your draw pile is empty. NL Draw !M! card.
Research.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw cards until you draw a Skill or your draw pile is empty. NL Draw !M! cards.

Investigation.NAME: Investigation
Investigation.DESCRIPTION: Draw cards until you draw 2 cards which cost 0 energy or your hand is full.
Investigation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw cards until you draw 2 cards which cost 0 energy or your hand is full.

Blizzare.NAME: Blizzare
Blizzare.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Nuclear Orb with !M! Potency. NL (4 Damage in total) NL Channel 1 Frost.
Blizzare.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel a Nuclear Orb with !M! Potency. NL (5 Damage in total) NL Channel 1 Frost.

PiecingWhale.NAME: Piecing Whale
PiecingWhale.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Potential Orb with !D! Potency. NL Apply !M! Piecing to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

Efficiency.NAME: Efficiency
Efficiency.DESCRIPTION: Every time an Orb loses Potency, gain !M! times as much Block.

Pull.NAME: Pull
Pull.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Magnetic Orb with !B! Potency. NL Draw !M! card.
Pull.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel a Magnetic Orb with !B! Potency. NL Draw !M! cards.

Engine.NAME: Engine
Engine.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Kinetic Orb with !D! Potency and randomly chosen target X times.
